title: "Do not disturb" mode on child account
content:
On my Pixel 3 I have two accounts, my personal adult account and another one for my 11 years old child. When I enable "do not disturb" mode on my adult account, it works as it should, meaning that I can receive calls and notifications from starred contacts (screen on and/or notification sound).

However, no matter what, I'm unable to see any notifications when "do not disturb" mode is enabled on my child account. I can get the call or the message, but the screen doesn't turn on and there's no sound coming to notify me, even if the call/notification is from a starred contact and the phone is set to allow calls/notifications from those contacts.

This happenes only on the child account, on the adult account it works as it should.

Any ideas?
